abstract: Internal e-mail showed the automaker’s dealers were worried about complaints over accelerators, contradicting the company’s official stance.
snippet: Internal e-mail showed the automaker’s dealers were worried about complaints over accelerators, contradicting the company’s official stance.
lead_paragraph: OTTAWA — Documents filed in a Canadian civil case against Toyota complaining of accelerator problems with a Lexus sedan show that the company viewed the problems as a serious threat to its reputation, even as officials publicly played down their importance.

headline.main: In Canadian Case, Filings Say Toyota Knew of Risk
headline.print_headline: In Canadian Case, Filings Say Toyota Knew of Risk

abstract: Toyota temporarily halted sales after Consumer Reports said the Lexus GX 460 had a problem that could lead to a rollover.
snippet: Toyota temporarily halted sales after Consumer Reports said the Lexus GX 460 had a problem that could lead to a rollover.
lead_paragraph: Toyota quickly suspended sales of its 2010 Lexus GX 460 sport utility vehicle on Tuesday after Consumer Reports magazine warned buyers that the model had a dangerous handling problem that could lead to a rollover and possibly “serious injury or death.”

headline.main: Lexus Stops Selling S.U.V. That Was Called Unsafe
headline.print_headline: Lexus Halts Sales of the GX 460 After a Magazine Calls It Unsafe

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA
